R4ZJ01
ZERO ~THUKIHAMI no KAMEN~ (JP)

hold A to walk through walls & other obstructions [wiiztec]
283D2F52 F7FF0800
040A1100 60000000
283D2F53 F7FF0000
040A1100 4BF92C31
E0000000 80008000
this will allow you to sequence break like crazy
including getting to the 3rd floor of Rougetsu Hall right from the beginning of the game

3 speed movement modifier [wiiztec]
040A1978 C0562DA4
040A17C4 C0962DA4
283D2F52 DFFB2004
04002DA4 40C00000
283D2F53 DFFB2000
04002DA4 3FC00000
283D2F53 00000000
04002DA4 3F800000
E0000000 80008000
walking is normal speed (to modify change 3F800000)
running is 1.5x speed (to modify change 3FC00000)
running & holding down on the dpad is 6x speed (to modify change 40C00000)

Color Mod

Hair Color [ZiT]
48000000 804E9EC8
DE000000 80008180
4A100000 FFFD1C04
14000000 xxxxxxFF
14000004 xxxxxxFF
E0000000 80008000
04065650 60000000

Dress Color [ZiT]
48000000 804E6908
DE000000 80008180
4A100000 FFFD51C4
14000000 vvvvvvFF
E0000000 80008000
04065650 60000000
xxxxxx = Color
vvvvvv = Color
000000 = Black
FF0000 = Red
00FF00 = lime
0000FF = Blue
FFFF00 = Yellow
FFA500 = Orange
FF00FF = Pink
800080 = Purple
FFFFFF = Standard
00000000 = No (Discoverer by punchline)
etc Color Code URL : http://www.finitojapan.com/cltable.html
